data.eml:eml: A new species of Austrothaumalea Tonnoir from Australia (Diptera: Thaumaleidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pivar, Robert J., Moulton, John K., Sinclair, Bradley J. (2016): A new species of Austrothaumalea Tonnoir from Australia (Diptera: Thaumaleidae). Zootaxa 4132 (4): 594-597, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4132.4.12
